statement.p: An unknown radioactive element decays into non-radioactive substances. In \displaystyle{500} days the radioactivity of a sample decreases by \displaystyle{65} percent.
(a) What is the half-life of the element?
(b) How long will it take for a sample of \displaystyle{100} mg to decay to \displaystyle{96} mg?
